painters.name: Leonardo da Vinci
painters.bio: Polymath and one of the most influential artists of the Renaissance

painters.name: Vincent van Gogh
painters.bio: Post-Impressionist painter known for his bold and expressive use of color

painters.name: Pablo Picasso
painters.bio: Cubist painter and sculptor who is widely regarded as one of the most influential artists of the 20th century

painters.name: Claude Monet
painters.bio: Founder of the Impressionist movement, known for his dreamy landscapes and captivating light effects

painters.name: Johannes Vermeer
painters.bio: Dutch painter known for his exquisite and intimate domestic scenes

painters.name: Raphael
painters.bio: Renaissance painter and architect, known for his harmonious and balanced compositions

painters.name: Caravaggio
painters.bio: Baroque painter known for his dramatic and emotionally charged works

painters.name: Rembrandt van Rijn
painters.bio: Dutch painter and etcher, known for his expressive and empathetic portraits

painters.name: Francisco Goya
painters.bio: Spanish Romantic painter, known for his bold and expressive use of color and light

painters.name: Salvador Dali
painters.bio: Surrealist painter, known for his bizarre and dreamlike creations

paintings.name: Mona Lisa
paintings.description: One of the most famous paintings in the world, the enigmatic smile of the Mona Lisa continues to fascinate art lovers

paintings.name: Starry Night
paintings.museum: Museum of Modern Art, New York
paintings.description: A swirling depiction of the night sky, with vibrant stars and a bright crescent moon

paintings.name: Guernica
paintings.description: A powerful anti-war painting, depicting the horrors of the bombing of Guernica during the Spanish Civil War

paintings.name: Impression, Sunrise
paintings.description: A dreamy depiction of a sunrise in the harbor of Le Havre, with soft colors and feathery brushstrokes

paintings.name: Girl with a Pearl Earring
paintings.description: A serene and intimate portrait of a young girl, with a large pearl earring and a gentle gaze

paintings.name: The Sistine Madonna
paintings.description: A beautiful depiction of the Virgin Mary and the Christ child, surrounded by saints and angels

paintings.name: The Taking of Christ
paintings.description: A dramatic and emotionally charged depiction of the arrest of Jesus in the Garden of Gethsemane

paintings.name: The Night Watch
paintings.description: A grand and dynamic depiction of a militia company, with vivid colors and dramatic lighting

paintings.name: The Third of May 1808
paintings.description: A powerful and haunting depiction of the brutal suppression of a rebellion in Madrid

paintings.name: The Persistence of Memory
paintings.museum: Museum of Modern Art, New York
paintings.description: A surreal and dreamlike depiction of melting clocks and other bizarre objects, in a dreamlike landscape
